summary: Test suite for the CKAN group model, covering basic attribute handling, package association, active‑group search filtering, and hierarchical operations such as retrieving children, parents, top‑level groups, and validating allowed parent assignments, supported by helper utilities for constructing hierarchies and extracting group names.
business_intent: Validate that group entities behave correctly within CKAN, ensuring reliable package linking, proper visibility of active groups in searches, and accurate maintenance of hierarchical relationships to support organized data categorisation.
